headline: ComEd Livens Expanded High Voltage Substation at Wilton Center, Built to Enable Largest Cluster of Wind and Solar Projects in Illinois
summary: CHICAGO, December 11, 2025--ComEd today announced it has livened an expansion of its 765 kilovolt (765 kV) Wilton Center substation in southern Will County. The substation expansion is a necessary upgrade to enable the largest cluster of utility-scale onshore wind and solar projects to be interconnected to the ComEd grid and in the PJM energy market starting in 2026.
